name: HORSE
description: HORSE is a short psychological horror game about a man tormented by his recent past and his sexual alienation. Hiding from the world, his familiar surroundings turn hostile and do their utmost to eat him alive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 320 x 240 minimum desktop resolution DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 161 MB available space
